duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage one or more handscoring contracts, including resource planning, training, coordinating with program and project managers, and post-project data analysis.
Apply science expertise in item development and scoring process, including meetings with clients and educators. Manage and score Math assessments.
Communicate through various channels, including chat, email, phone, reports, and videoconference meetings. Interact with customers and educators in-person and virtually.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers. Conduct live or pre-recorded training for Science and Math assessments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science, Physical Sciences, or related field (Master's preferred)
